code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Movie from'./components/MovieCard';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[movies,setMovies]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetch('https://aop-nosql.onrender.com/api/movies').then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setMovies(data);setLoading(false);}).catch(err=>{console.error('Erro ao carregar filmes:',err);setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading movies..."});if(movies.length===0)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"No movies found."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Filmes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexWrap:'wrap',gap:'20px'},children:movies.map(movie=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Movie,{movie:movie},movie._id))})]});}export default App;
